column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I love common bond! I was concerned that quality and customer care would drop off when ownership changed hands but its much much better now.  Expanded hours
column3: nicer servers. They also make more quantities so things don't run out early. You can now go in for dinner and still get good selection of goodies. One thing that changed forever
column4: the main reason that I put up with their previous crappy service was their seeded baguette. It is no more.  They must have not passed on the recipe because it isn't the same. Last time I went
column5: they didn't even have it anymore
column6: so it may be lost forever.
